title: Andrew Zimmern & José Andrés | Paul Yoon
description:
Andrew Zimmern and José Andrés talk about Zimmern's new show What's Eating America and how it explores the ties between political issues and cuisine.

Author Paul Yoon discusses his book Run Me to Earth and his dog’s unique role in his writing process.
